Ingredients: Equal amount of espresso and steamed milk
Details: Pour the espresso through the milk and serve.

Ingredients: 2/3 or more steamed milk and espresso
Details: Pour the espresso through the milk and serve.

Ingredients: Espresso with just a "mark" of steamed milk
Details: Add milk to the expresso after pressing.
Can be sweetened with sugar or creme.

Ingredients: Instant coffee, water and milk Shake to create a foam, then pour over ice and serve.

Details: A specialty in Australia and New Zealand. The foam is often decorated with a motif.
